```{r}

raw_data |>  head()

raw_data <- 
  raw_data |> 
  select(-c(Patient_id,
            Tissue)) |> 
  pivot_longer(starts_with('ENSG'), 
               names_to = 'gene',
               values_to = 'expression') 

gene_list <- 
  raw_data |> 
  pull(gene)

options(httr.timeout = 1000)
```
